quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive examples with mostly current CLI syntax. All previous major issues (broken links, incorrect threshold table, missing --output-format) have been fixed. Only one minor issue remains with an outdated --multi-pass flag reference.

issues.description: Example on line 243 uses non-existent --multi-pass flag
issues.fix_suggestion: Remove --multi-pass from the example since multi-pass is enabled by default. The command should be: 'debtmap analyze . --attribution'. This section (lines 808-836) already correctly explains that multi-pass is default and only --no-multi-pass exists.
